name: Bag of Bounty
entries: This is a sturdy leather sack with tiny Siberys shards embedded into the lining. If you have the Mark of Hospitality you can use an action to cast {@spell create food and water}, drawing a feast from within the bag. You shape this meal with your thoughts. You can create the standard bland fare without requiring any sort of check, but you can attempt to create finer food by making a Charisma check; if you're proficient with {@item cook's utensils|PHB}, add your bonus to this check. A failed check results in a sour and squalid meal.
A bag of bounty can be used up to three times over the course of a day. After that, the bag can't be used again until the next dawn.
